name: Paula Fernandes
description: '''Paula Fernandes de Souza''' ({{IPA|pt-BR|ˈpawlɐ feʁˈnɐ̃dʒis|lang}}; born August 28, 1984, in [[Sete Lagoas]], [[Minas Gerais]]) is a Brazilian singer-songwriter. She won [[Latin Grammy Award for Best Sertaneja Music Album|Latin Grammy Awards]] for her albums ''Amanhecer'' in 2016 and for ''Origens (Ao Vivo em Sete Lagoas)'' in 2020.
